title: What causes Obesity
summary: This graph shows three potential causes of Obesity , and breaks down their relative contribution .
Fast_Food emerges as the most important , followed by Genetic factors .
Lack_of_Exercises of exercise is comparatively unimportant to these other two factors .
gold: Fast food causes 60 % of obesity , genetic predisposition some 30 % whilst lack of exercise contributes the other 10 %
